message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. It's a valuable piece and I believe this price reflects its worth. I'm confident it will be a great investment for you. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 is a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. This is a fair price, considering its value to me. I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $850,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $875,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.
